hero.role: Software Engineer specializing in building exceptional digital experiences
hero.description: I craft beautiful, performant, and accessible web applications using modern technologies. Passionate about clean code, user experience, and continuous learning.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: I am a passionate Software Engineer with a strong foundation in web development and a keen eye for design. My journey in tech started with a curiosity about how things work on the internet, which led me to dive deep into full-stack development.
about.description2: I specialize in building scalable web applications using React, Node.js, and modern cloud technologies. I love solving complex problems and turning ideas into reality through code.
about.description3: I care deeply about code quality, testing, documentation, and CI/CD pipelines to deliver reliable and maintainable software.

cleanCode.title: Clean Code & TDD
cleanCode.description: Writing maintainable, well-structured code with strong testing practices (JUnit, Mockito)

microservices.title: Microservices Architecture
microservices.description: Building scalable systems with Spring Boot microservices, RabbitMQ messaging, and secured APIs

innovation.title: Innovation & AI
innovation.description: Experience building intelligent chatbots with Rasa and integrating AI-driven features into applications

agile.title: Agile Collaboration
agile.description: Team-oriented mindset, working in Scrum environments with CI/CD and continuous improvement

experience.title: Experience
experience.subtitle: My professional journey and the amazing companies I've worked with

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: Here are some of my recent projects that showcase my skills and experience

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind or want to collaborate? Feel free to reach out!
contact.description: I'm always interested in hearing about new projects and opportunities. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
